V.F.M Fuel Panel - is there a mod similar to this?

i know of Tac Fuel Balancer while it does a great job of balancing i need a simpler mod like V.F.M Fuel Panel witch was excellent in fuel transfer and nothing else

simple windows for selecting tanks and transferring fuel

Wait till 0.25. They are improving stock fuel transfers.

EDIT: Well I'm not so sure now, I may be confusing conjecture or possibly 0.26 features as I can't find it now. I thought I heard it was being reworked... somewhere.

Edited September 17, 2014 by Alshain

Wait till 0.25. They are improving stock fuel transfers.

EDIT: Well I'm not so sure now, I may be confusing conjecture or possibly 0.26 features as I can't find it now. I thought I heard it was being reworked... somewhere.

hmmm didn't know that thx lets hope they make it good
Moved to General Addon Affairs, where people are more likely to know (the Support (modded installs) forum is for help with mod issues, not finding mods).

Moved to General Addon Affairs, where people are more likely to know (the Support (modded installs) forum is for help with mod issues, not finding mods).

sorry :)
Just so you know, I'm actually in the middle of a rewrite of V.F.M., expect it out in the next couple of days
I'm not familiar with V.F.M Fuel Panel, how does it differ from TAC? From what I've gathered by a quick glance TAC seems to do everything that VFM did.

Main 2 things compared to TAC are:

It kept things separated by vessel, even when docked, so if you docked to a refueling station with 8 tanks, you could transfer out of those 8 tanks and into your 3 tanks on your ship in a just a few clicks.

And, I also had a fuel network system similar to KAS that would allow fuel transfers without needing ships to be docked in any manner.

Just so you know, I'm actually in the middle of a rewrite of V.F.M., expect it out in the next couple of days

nice be sure to put red letter so i can see it cant wait for it i need it bad!!!
